mapper.select: select h.attribute_varchar1 from spfm_company_basic h where h.company_id = #{companyId} and h.group_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT h.budget_account_name ROM smdm_budget_account h HERE h.budget_account_num = #{budgetAccountNum} AND h.tenant_id =#{tenantId}
SELECT h.wbs_name FROM smdm_wbs h WHERE h.wbs_code = #{wbsCode} AND h.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
